version_description:
• New Version History interface, let you check LightScreen’s new features more convenient
• Bug fixes and improvements

• New Version History interface, let you check LightScreen’s new features more convenient
• Fixed a Chinese localization issue

• Markup screenshot via GoodPoint
• There is a new share button in every Edit view, so you can share edited screenshot without save it
• Fixed a status bar display issue when running on iOS 10
• Bug fixes and improvements

• Optimized for iOS 10
 • A lot of improvements under the hood

• Now in the main interface, you can long press any screenshot to adjust order of your screenshots
• Supported import and editing wide gamut images
• Use Save as Screenshot extension to convert images to screenshots now opens LightScreen's main app

• Now in the main interface, you can long press any screenshot to adjust order of your screenshots
• Now you can choose Keynote gradient background, blur background and transparent background in the Device Frame interface
• Supported import and edit

Thank you for using LightScreen! This update includes improvements and bug fixes.

• Redesigned Today widget, now supports scrolling horizontally, let you view more recent screenshots on the Notification Center
• Updated App Store screenshots

Thank you for using LightScreen! This update includes improvements and bug fixes.
• Improved Tagging

Thank you for using LightScreen! This update includes improvements and bug fixes.
• Improved support for iCloud Photo Library

Thank you for using LightScreen! This update includes new features and bug fixes.

Status Bar Editor now support...
• Bold Text
• Modify Apple Watch screenshots' display time to 10:09
Thank you for using LightScreen! This update includes improvements and bug fixes.

Thank you for using LightScreen! This update includes new features and bug fixes.

• Quick export screenshots via Drag & Drop on iPad with iOS 11 beta
• Added status bar with iOS 11 style in Status Bar Editor
• Minor interface tuning

修复了在部分 iPad 上使用“拖放操作” (Drag & Drop) 可能闪退的问题。

近期更新：
• 现可在使用 iOS 11 (测试版) 的 iPad 上通过“拖放操作” (Drag & Drop) 快速导出截图
• 现可在状态栏编辑器选用 iOS 11 风格的状态栏
• 少量界面优化

• 改进了“拖放操作” (Drag & Drop，限使用 iOS 11 的 iPad)
• 改进了与 iOS 11 的兼容性
• 状态栏编辑器：新增 iOS 11 风格的电池图标

近期更新：
• 现可在使用 iOS 11 的 iPad 上通过“拖放操作” (Drag & Drop) 快速导出截图
• 现可在状态栏编辑器选用 iOS 11 风格的状态栏

感谢使用 LightScreen！本次更新包括全新特性，功能改进和问题修复。

• 现支持在运行 iOS 11 的 iPad 上进行拖放操作 (Drag & Drop)
- 从其它应用拖拽图片至 LightScreen 来将图片转换为截图并保存至 iOS 照片图库
- 从 LightScreen 的任一界面拖拽截图至其它应用来实现截图快速导出

• 状态栏编辑器现充分支持 iOS 11 iPad 分屏截图
• 支持 iOS 11 智能反转颜色：反转开启时自
感谢使用 LightScreen！本次更新包含多项问题修复。

感谢使用 LightScreen！本次更新包含新功能，改进和问题修复。

• 为 iPhone X 优化的全面屏界面
• 支持 iPhone X 截图的状态栏编辑器
• 新手势：双指横向滑动来切换界面主题，就像“极光词典”那样
• 启动屏幕现使用暗色主题
• 改进在 iOS 11 上的显示效果和用户体验

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us by sending an ema

感谢使用 LightScreen！本次更新包含新功能和问题修复。

• 截图画廊界面新增视差效果
• LightScreen 启动时将不再自动创建空相簿
• 修复打开截图标签 URL 时应用意外退出的问题

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us by sending an email to lightscreen.app@gmail.com
